answers.answer: Hi, low triglycerides is a good prognostic factor. Besides that the other lipid profile values are within the normal range. High glucose values could indicate diabetes. The best way to prevent diabetes is to Eat sensibly i.e. avoid fat to the lowest extent possible, do not use easily digested carbohydrate. Avoid food high in purines to control uric acid levels. High-purine foods are organ meats like kidney, fish like mackerel, herring, sardines and mussels, and also yeast. Include a whole lot of fruits and vegetables in your meal.  A nutritionist should be able to give you a sample meal plan.  Fat is taboo in any form, restrict usage to the least. Regards.
